root.name: Intensity Profile
root.description:
Plots an intensity profile of a given ROI.
Can plot mean over T or/and Z too.
root.author: fab - Fabrice de Chaumont
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.0.3 Date 2014-04-15 12:01:49
Fix a bug if all sequences are closed
- Version 1.0.0.2 Date 2014-02-04 14:25:04
Fix some thread issues
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2014-02-04 10:33:46
- Added some extra information in the labels of the graphs.
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2014-02-03 16:29:01
New: - Excel export - Console export
Changed: - Mean intensity on surface is now based on kernel function.
- Version 0.0.1.3 Date 2013-11-06 14:58:03
Fix problem with new ROI introduced in 1.4.0.0
- Version 0.0.1.2 Date 2012-11-08 17:06:35
fix label
- Version 0.0.1.1 Date 2012-11-08 16:38:22
minor fix
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-11-08 16:35:18
